com.diffplug.common.rx

Class RxOptional<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.rx.RxBox.Default<java.util.Optional<T>>
      • com.diffplug.common.rx.RxOptional<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.diffplug.common.base.Box<java.util.Optional<T>>, IObservable<java.util.Optional<T>>, RxBox<java.util.Optional<T>>, RxGetter<java.util.Optional<T>>, java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Optional<T>>, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Optional<T>>

    public class RxOptional<T>
extends RxBox.Default<java.util.Optional<T>>
    An extension of RxBox>, with convenience methods for converting it to an RxSet.
